Action.description: An action for an extension to take at a specific action point.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the extension Action.

type.description: The description of the extension Action.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the extension action.

type.description: The name of the extension action.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the role for invoking the extension action.

type.description: The ARN of the role for invoking the extension action.

properties.name: Uri
properties.description: The URI of the extension action.

type.description: The URI of the extension action.

Actions.description: A list of actions for an extension to take at a specific action point.

Parameter.description: A parameter for the extension to send to a specific action.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the extension Parameter.

type.description: The description of the extension Parameter.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value tags to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value tags to apply to this resource.
